alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 4:19AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SUNDAY TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. 2 to 6 inches of snow between 6000 and 7000 feet, with up to 12 inches near the peaks. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM Sunday to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause visibility restrictions in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven
